extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Zoom Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Zoom products are affected by retrieving the installed version of Zoom Client for Meetings and Zoom Rooms for Conference Room.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are the Zoom products affected by the CVEs?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Zoom Products
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest updates to Zoom Client for Meetings and Zoom Rooms for Conference Room to at least version 5.10.0 to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

affected_products: Zoom Client for Meetings for Windows before version 5.10.0
Zoom Rooms for Conference Room for Windows before version 5.10.0
Zoom Client for Meetings for Android, iOS, Linux, macOS, and Windows before version 5.10.0
